description.value: This extension is to indicate if hiearchies were applied to a Condition Category, and if applied, whether the Condition Category is superseded.

short.value: This is to indicate whether hiearchies were applied to a Condition Category, and if applied, whether the Condition Category is superseded: applied-superseded|applied-not-superseded|not-applied|not-applicable

definition.value: Hiearchies applied to a Condition Category status

comment.value: This extension hiearchies were applied to a Condition Category, and if applied, whether the Condition Category is superseded.

short.value: Indicate whether hiearchies were applied to a Condition Category, and if applied, whether the Condition Category is superseded.
